body:
Interesting, as my copy looks like:
https://skitch.com/mipearson/gu7i3/screen-shot-2011-12-25-at-4.13.01-pm

I'll grab your merge and see if I can reproduce.

Can you please tell me which OS / Kindle client version you're using?

On Sun, Dec 25, 2011 at 12:42 PM, Xavier Noria <
reply@reply.github.com
> wrote:

> I close the pull request to prevent the merge button to be pushed, since I
> did the merge myself after revising the patch. But we can continue the
> thread here anyway.
>
> ---
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/3758#issuecomment-3269667
>



-- 
Michael Pearson
